findings.title: Proper Handling of isActive in UserProfile::_withdraw()
findings.description: In the `_withdraw()` function of `UserProfile`, the user profile deletion logic is incomplete, leaving `u.isActive` as `true` after withdrawal, allowing a deleted user to call `updateNickname()` and reserve many nicknames by depositing and withdrawing an NFT multiple times from different addresses.

findings.title: Proper Handling of reward() in RewardTheAuthor
findings.description: Improper handling of the reward() function in the RewardTheAuthor contract can lead to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Possible Overflow Prevention With SafeMath
findings.description: The CashierDesk contract can be improved by using SafeMath to prevent common overflow or underflow issues when working with uint256 operands.

findings.title: Duplicate Pool Detection and Prevention In MutiRewardPool
findings.description: The `addPool()` function in `MutiRewardPool` contract does not perform necessary sanity checks to prevent a new pool with duplicate `_stakingDuration` from being added.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Metatime protocol, there is a special administrative account, i.e., owner, which plays a critical role in governing and regulating system-wide operations. The privileged account needs to be scrutinized.

findings.title: Proper Handling of Unsupported Token in RewardTheAuthor::claim()
findings.description: The `RewardTheAuthor` contract's `claim()` function does not properly handle unsupported tokens.
